about_the_game:
Enhance your Crusader Kings II Experience with the Mediterranean Portraits pack. Mediterranean Portraits adds new clothing and thousands of unique face combinations for both male and female characters while playing as Mediterranean Nations.

These portraits have been updated with the release of the Iberian Portraits pack. Owners of the Mediterranean Portrait packs will receive the new, updated Mediterranean portraits for free.

Crusader Kings II explores one of the defining periods in world history in an experience crafted by the masters of Grand Strategy. Medieval Europe is brought to life in this epic game of knights, schemes, and thrones...
detailed_description:
Enhance your Crusader Kings II Experience with the Mediterranean Portraits pack. Mediterranean Portraits adds new clothing and thousands of unique face combinations for both male and female characters while playing as Mediterranean Nations.

These portraits have been updated with the release of the Iberian Portraits pack. Owners of the Mediterranean Portrait packs will receive the new, updated Mediterranean portraits for free.

Crusader Kings II explores one of the defining periods in world history in an experience crafted by the masters of Grand Strategy. Medieval Europe is brought to life in this epic game of knights, schemes, and thrones...

linux_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: IntelR PentiumR IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Hard disk space: 2 Gb
  • Video Card: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce
    > 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Mac OS X 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or higher
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:3-button mouse and keyboard
